name: Repair of the Taku
description:
This  game was made in less then 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2020 - Have fun!

A mysterious and ancient artifact, called the "Taku", is broken and you need to repair it.

the "Taku" takes care of the balance between the past, the present and the future.
But now you have to rescue the world by jump through the timelines, with the power
the "Taku" gave you, to bring the balance back.

Controls:

Up: W
Down : S
Left: A
Right: D
Time Travel: Space
Interact/Pick-Up: E
